category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_dataset_vers_export
preference.preference_description: Prevents a user from exporting all dataset versions (unless transferring site ownership) by disabling the Include All Versions button in the Import/Export Options dialog box. This role-based preference applies even when running command-line utilities such as the item_export or the data_share utility. Valid Values: Accepts the value FALSE. If set to any other value, the system ignores the preference setting.
